author: Simon Difford
description: An anise laced alternative to a Mojito. The name refers to the opaque white colour of the drink after soda is added to the anis.
name: Milky Mojito
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in glass
Fill glass with crushed ice, add other ingredients
TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws
